name: Bowdown
description:
Bowdown is an online archery combat game. Where you can swing around and shoot your friends with arrows!

In the current game mode, one player is King. This is indicated by an orange beam above their head. The King must try and stay king for as long as possible. If another player defeats the King, that player becomes the new King!

Pro tip: use right click to grapple!

If you enjoy the game please consider backing me on Kickstarter! https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/698520615/bowdown

This game has been a side project of mine and I'm trying to raise enough money to work on it full time!
